alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 3:38PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Rankin, central Hinds and southwestern Madison Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 337 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pocahontas to Dry Grove. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pocahontas around 345 PM CDT. Jackson and Annandale around 400 PM CDT. Ridgeland and Byram around 405 PM CDT. Madison around 410 PM CDT. Gluckstadt and Whites around 415 PM CDT. Richland and Florence around 425 PM CDT. Pearl and Monterey around 435 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central Mississippi.
